name: hl7.fhir.uv.patient-corrections
title: Patient Request for Corrections Implementation Guide
description: The Patient Request for Corrections Implementation Guide provides a method for communicating a patient's request for corrections to their patient data, as well as a way for health care organizations to respond to those requests. (built Mon, Aug 21, 2023 14:17-0500-05:00)
author: HL7 International - Patient Empowerment Workgroup
